name: Adidas Runners Shake Out Run
about:
Ease into movement with the Adidas Runners Shakeout Run – a relaxed, low-intensity session designed to loosen up your legs, calm the nerves, and connect with the crew before race day or after a tough training week.

This isn’t about pace or distance—it’s about flow, breath, and community. Whether you’re prepping for a big race or just looking for an easy run to reset, this is your chance to move light, feel good, and vibe with your fellow runners.
